release.description: New version to work with Eclipse 3.1 M4+.
release.action:
Added compatibility with 3.1 M4.
This version is for Eclipse 3.1 M4 (and hopefully later versions). It may be compatible with earlier milestone releases of 3.1.
It is _not_ compatible with 2.1.x or 3.0.x. For these versions, please use v0.0.14.

release.description: Reintroduced Eclipse 2.1.x compatibility. Add ability to jump on type.
release.action: Reintroduced compatibility with Eclipse 2.1.x. Also added the ability to jump to the implementation class from an interface type.
Enhanced the EJB method mapping functionality. Now also supports jumping between implementation and interface of EJB Home methods (i.e. ejbHomeSomeMethod).

Added method mapping functionality in order to be able to jump to methods on home interfaces. Now for example, finding implementors on home.create(String id) jumps to the ejbCreate method in the bean.
Updated the plugin to work with Eclipse 3.0M6. From this version on new versions will only support Eclipse 3.0M6+.
Fixed a problem which prevented the plugin from running on anything but the Eclipse 3.0 stream.
Added an autofind button on the property page.
Added a preferences button for setting up the file mask of ejb-jar.xml files.
Now also considers overriding/overridden methods as candidates.
EJB awareness: Moved the enablement action to the project's property page.
Added an action to jump to an interface declaring the selected method.
Bug fix: Jumping to classes loaded from .jar files (with attached source) is now possible.
